data.name: RPG Maker MV - Add-on Vol.4: Kid Generator Parts
data.detailed_description:
NOTE: This DLC is included in the RPG Maker MV - Add-on Pack.

Kids Generator Parts (DLC 4) contains 127 parts to create kids through RPG Maker MV's character generator. These pieces may be used to create both child heroes and NPCs, with a variety of looks appropriate for many social settings and classes. From princes to paupers, you can customize the perfect child and add amazing detail to your RPG Maker projects.

Contents:
  • 21 Front Hair
  • 21 Rear Hair
  • 1 Ears
  • 14 Eyes
  • 13 Eyebrows
  • 2 Noses
  • 18 Mouth
  • 4 Facial Marks
  • 21 Clothes
  • 6 Accessory 1
  • 4 Accessory 2
  • 1 Glasses

data.short_description: Kids Generator Parts (DLC 4) contains 134 parts to create kids through RPG Maker MV's character generator.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
